Reviews.Title: Excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Connie Wu
Reviews.Content: Great camera, comes with everything as described. The tripod isn't as great quality but that's what I expected. I love the photos I take with both sized lens and especially like the self-clicker button that this package comes with. Recommend this package for anyone with a decent budget. The battery life is amazing! One charge lasts me about 600+ photos.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding value
Reviews.Author: The watch watcher "Dino"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this bundle after looking at many offers and feel it was the best by far.  Nikkor lenses were included and two Vivitar lenses.  The carry bags that were included were good quality and not cheaply made.  The camera itself is fun to use and takes great photos.  Would highly recommend this bundle for anyone interested in a good camera with good accessories.

Reviews.Title: Beyond Expectations!
Reviews.Author: Susan Mathews
Reviews.Content: My husband is having  so much fun with this camera......especially with all of the different lenses that came with it.  The qulaity of the pictures is amazing as well!I was struggling between Nikkon and Canon....I think Nikkon is the hands-down winner

Reviews.Title: Customer Service Was Lousy
Reviews.Author: Robtex
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with all the extras that came with the camera for the price. I did have an issue with my camera being in another language when I received it, I contacted PHOTO4LESS and the person who answered the phone could not help me. She took my information and said someone would get back in touch with me. That was almost a month ago and still no one has bothered calling.I figured it out myself!  I will not be doing business with PHOTO4LESS in the future.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: James  Johnston
Reviews.Content: Very complete kit, excellent value, Camera is easy to use and takes excellent photos. Computer software also easy to use. Would recommend to one and all.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR
Reviews.Author: Becky Curbo
Reviews.Content: This was the best camera bundle buy over all of our friends purchases who also bought the Nikon D3200.  As for the camera itself we LOVE it!  Not since back in the 70's when everyone had a 35mm have we enjoyed using a camera.  We've had a lot of point and shoot digital camera and have been pleased, but they don't match up to this camera.  It was worth getting the package deal and the Nikon D3200 for Dummies book to help us know how to use this camera.  (Would also recommend for a serious user.)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Stacie L Jones
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these Nikons. Very happy! Camera takeswonderful pictures. Perfect package for anyone starting outand wanting to be better with photography. Not only is thecamera package great but the company is too. The shippingwas in a very timely matter and packed great!

Reviews.Title: A must have
Reviews.Author: Hathaway
Reviews.Content: Awesome package. Loved everything about it!!! Takes beautiful pictures.Highly recommended a must have for any household. Best Christmas gift ever.

Reviews.Title: very very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this camera, every thing works great. Very impressed with all that came with the bundle :) recommend this package to everyone

Reviews.Title: Perfect kit for Starters
Reviews.Author: Ethan
Reviews.Content: Tripod that comes with the kit is crappy, but other than that it's an amazing kit and the value of the other accessories are worth it.

Reviews.Title: Gift from the wish list
Reviews.Author: B. Hammond
Reviews.Content: Bought this as gift for husband; he had been wanting to go from SLR to D-SLR for ages. This is a great starter kit. Not all the pieces are pieces are the best quality (the tripods, for example) but the important things--the lenses and the camera body--are of the usual Nikon quality. For the price, this is a steal!

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal w/ a great camera and equipment.
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: Was a great buy.  I reviewed many cameras, but this was an amazing deal.  Camera is very nice to work with.  Can't wait to see where this camera takes me with my want to be a photographer.  Will for sure recommend people to buy this.

Reviews.Title: Good camera - but it's grey market and accessories are not great
Reviews.Author: Daniel B. Mackin
Reviews.Content: Well, the camera's great.  I'll start there.  BUT...This is a grey market kit, which I didn't know when I bought it.  It's not illegal to sell or buy grey market stuff, but it can make it complicated when getting repairs.  And, you can't help but feel you were misled by purchasing something meant for the overseas markets!Also, the accessories seem pretty low-quality.  In retrospect, I would rather have bought the Nikon kit for the USA market, saved up for accessories and purchased higher-quality items.Let me be clear though - the items were all new, the camera is flawless, the remote is nice, I use the bag and the cleaning kit all the time.  Live and learn!Since purchasing this kit, I've bought an auto-focus 200 mm lens.  The one in this kit is MANUAL FOCUS ONLY!  Great skill to learn, but be aware of what you are getting.

Reviews.Title: great camera great price
Reviews.Author: Arturo Romero
Reviews.Content: great camera great pricegreat option for getting a bundle, all the futures lens filteres works great. much cheapper if you buy them appart

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Nelson Longa
Reviews.Content: Great  bundle, very complet, excelent oportunity, the only observation is that the backoack should has a parí of strap to atached the tripod.In general its so complet I recomended 100 %.

Reviews.Title: I am excited with d3200 nikon camera
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Avalos
Reviews.Content: I am excited with d3200 nikon camera. I bought it and the next day i went on vacation with my family, all an positive experience. We took a lot of photos and videos wonderful. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Charles Kemp
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. It takes really good pictures. Has several extras that are good. All in all, I would purchase this package again.

Reviews.Title: Quick delivery!
Reviews.Author: Connie M.
Reviews.Content: I could not believe how quickly the camera came!  It was here in just 4 days. Everything looks great!  Love the light weight body.  I was surprised to see that it came with a cd.  Can't wait to learn the camera and start taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Helena Albarran
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what I was looking for! It was the best deal around for the price! Lots of extras included!

Reviews.Title: The Nikon D3200
Reviews.Author: POPONG
Reviews.Content: One of the best DSLR camera in the market today!!!  With camera PLUS all the accessories you will need in capturing unforgettable moments.  GREAT DEAL!!!

Reviews.Title: Good enough!
Reviews.Author: Patrik
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a Nikon camera in mid price range, and this was the optimum package at Amazon in for my wallet. The materials in the extras are not the best but good enough. Everything except for extra lenses are in there. So as for a starter system camera or casual photography it is a very good alternative. For more extreme shots and picture processing it leaves something out though. It comes with the cheaper alternative for lenses. If you are looking for the best it will be a bit more expensive.

Reviews.Title: amazing package
Reviews.Author: dom09
Reviews.Content: Yeah the tripod is chincy but I don't open the telescoping legs all the way I use it to shoot children or landscapes. I'll probably buy a better quality one. But EVERYTHING else is beautiful! The camera is superb and the accessories are perfection!!! I highly recommend this package!!!!!

Reviews.Title: nikon d3200 kit
Reviews.Author: mayur shah
Reviews.Content: wasn't what I expected but is ok  wasn't happy about paying postage on the specifications it said free postageand on top of that I had to pay import vat £108 which I wasn't told of  if I had known all that I would have gotsomething from uk  would have worked out cheaper

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: Javier Vargas
Reviews.Content: The camera is amazing. The camera and accessories arrived in perfect condition and with all items. Photo4less have a good customer service. Thanks

Reviews.Title: In love with my nikon
Reviews.Author: jess
Reviews.Content: This camera is the bomb. Everything I hoped for. The accessories that it comes with perfect. Great value and it was shipped very fast

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Andy Tam
Reviews.Content: Nikon D3200 24.2 Mp Cmos Digital SLR with 18-55mm F/3.5-5.6 Af-s and 70-300mm VR Lenses + Accessory Bundle, was good

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: E. Grant "Big E"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I included the accident protection plan, just to be on the safe side. The more pictures I take, the better I am getting. I took pictures of my son and niece's college graduation. The pictures turned out very crisp and clear. This is a great investment.

Reviews.Title: Good pack, not all boxes were 'new', no international warranty card
Reviews.Author: K C Varsanyi
Reviews.Content: Good pack, not all boxes were 'new' but items appear new, no international warranty card supplied and online Nikon does allow NZ delivery to be registered.  Photos are of very good quality.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Axel
Reviews.Content: Not excellent. Tripod is too weak. All equipment are good and the camera is excellent. Good lens for excellent pics.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 package
Reviews.Author: John L. Vormittag
Reviews.Content: I feel the package was well worth the price. The camera and 2 telephoto lens plus the SD memory card, remote and filters were very good. All in all a good buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: williams vilardell
Reviews.Content: great packaging, good quality, the only detail is that the camera only comes in English and in some Asian language, but everything else is ok

Reviews.Title: who say this product good ,that is cheat
Reviews.Author: gowin
Reviews.Content: i want return this  ,don't buy this product.everthing is bad never buy never,never never ...disappoint disappoint,disappoint can i return this product.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Photo4Less Top Value Accessories Kit includes
Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera Body - Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens -  Nikon Zoom Telephoto 70-300mm f/4-5.6G Zoom-Nikkor Autofocus Lens - note that the lens will only autofocus with a camera body that contains a motor, and will therefore work with the Nikon D3200 in manual mode only - for a kit with a auto focus lens click here: http://vv2.com/2u3
52mm 2X Professional Telephoto Lens High Definition - 52mm Wide Angle Lens  - Digital DSLR Auto Power Slave Flash - 50" Photo Video Quality Tripod - 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD) 52mm - ML-L3 Wireless Remote Control - 62mm Ultraviolet UV Protector Filter
Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Card - Transcend 8 GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card -  Camera Lens & Accessory Backpack Black/Silver
Water Resistant Shock Proof Camcorder & SLR Camera Case - Hi-Speed SD USB Card Reader -  Camera & Lens 3 Piece Cleaning Kit - Tri-fold Memory Card Wallet LCD Screen Protectors (Clear) - Table Top Tripod
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 24.2 Mp Cmos Digital SLR with 18-55mm F/3.5-5.6 Af-s Dx Vr Nikkor Zoom Lens + Nikon Zoom Telephoto 70-300mm F/4-5.6g Zoom-nikkor Autofocus Lens + 52mm 2x Professional Lens +High Definition 52mm Wide Angle Lens + Auto Flash + Uv Filter Kit withwith 24GB Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle
